win:registry_test.comment: Ensure 'message rtf format' is equals to '1'
Ensure 'message plain format mime' is equals to '1'
Ensure 'check default client' is equals to '1'

win:registry_object.comment: Ensure 'message rtf format' is equals to '1'
win:registry_object.win:name: message rtf format

win:registry_object.win:name: message plain format mime

win:registry_object.comment: Ensure 'check default client' is equals to '1'
win:registry_object.win:name: check default client

win:registry_state.comment: Ensure 'message rtf format' is equals to '1'
Ensure 'message plain format mime' is equals to '1'
Ensure 'check default client' is equals to '1'
